product_description: A chunky cork wedge and platform bring eye-catching height to a retro-inspired sandal secured by a wide strap at the ankle.
product_details_and_care:
A chunky cork wedge and platform bring eye-catching height to a retro-inspired sandal secured by a wide strap at the ankle.
3 1/2" heel; 2" platform
Adjustable ankle strap with buckle closure
Leather upper/synthetic lining and sole
Imported
